pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kulesu nimantitā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.3_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vosāsantiyo ṭhitā honti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivāressantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.9_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivārethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.12_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivāressatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.14_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.15.1_1: tatra ce sā bhikkhunī vosāsamānarūpā ṭhitā hoti—‘idha sūpaṁ detha,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.15.1_3: tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā— ‘apasakka tāva, bhagini,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.15.1_5: Ekassa cepi bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya taṁ bhikkhuniṁ apasādetuṁ— ‘apasakka tāva, bhagini,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.15.1_6: yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī’ti paṭidesetabbaṁ tehi bhikkhūhi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.16_0: ‘gārayhaṁ, āvuso, dhammaṁ āpajjimhā asappāyaṁ pāṭidesanīyaṁ, taṁ paṭidesemā’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.2_0: kulaṁ nāma cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṁ, brāhmaṇakulaṁ, vessakulaṁ, suddakulaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.4_0: pañcannaṁ bhojanānaṁ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.8_0: yathāmittatā yathāsandiṭṭhatā yathāsambhattatā yathāsamānupajjhāyakatā yathāsamānācariyakatā— “idha sūpaṁ detha,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.13_0: Tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā— “apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.14_0: Ekassa cepi bhikkhuno anapasādito— “khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.2.1_0: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.2.2_0: Upasampannāya vematiko vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.2.3_0: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.2.4_0: Ekatoupasampannāya vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
